body_html: I have tried the depthwise convolution with nn.Conv2d(64,64, 3, 1, 1, groups=64), but it is only around 2x faster than nn.Conv2d(64,64,3,1,1). The input size is 1x64x256x256, could you tell me what's wrong? my pytorch version is 0.3.0.post4

body: I have tried the depthwise convolution with `nn.Conv2d(64,64, 3, 1, 1, groups=64)`, but it is only around  2x faster than `nn.Conv2d(64,64,3,1,1).` The input size is 1x64x256x256, could you tell me what's wrong? my pytorch version is 0.3.0.post4
